name: Holy Smokes BBQ Sauce
description:
Holy Smokes Apple Slather BBQ Sauce is a mild, sweet BBQ sauce with molasses, apple sauce, chunks of apples, cinnamon, nutmeg and a secret or two.

See our web page at www.appleslather.com

Im about the age where most spicy stuff bothers my stomach, and the problem with most sauces is that they are too acidic, Not AppleSlather !

We use it in pulled pork, baby back ribs, spare ribs, baked beans, salad dressing, meatloaf and chicken wings.
